results.title: The use of metformin in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: an updated review.
results.text_hl: Evidence about the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on fetal @<m>DISEASE_Obstetric_Labor_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007744 @@@and obstetric complication@@@ rates is conflicting.

citations.NLM: Notaro ALG, Neto FTL. The use of metformin in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: an updated review. J Assist Reprod Genet. 2022 Mar;39(3):573-579. PMID: 35156149
citations.BibTeX: @article{35156149, title={The use of metformin in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: an updated review.}, author={Notaro ALG and Neto FTL}, journal={J Assist Reprod Genet}, volume={39}, number={3}, pages={573-579}}

results.title: Polycystic ovarian syndrome and pregnancy outcome.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ seem to experience increased risk of cesarean delivery while their newborns face increased perinatal morbidity and mortality. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use seems to reduce the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Obstetric_Labor_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007744 @@@obstetrical complications@@@; however, prospective studies are necessary on the field.

citations.NLM: Iavazzo C, Vitoratos N. Polycystic ovarian syndrome and pregnancy outcome. Arch Gynecol Obstet. 2010 Sep;282(3):235-9. PMID: 20458488
citations.BibTeX: @article{20458488, title={Polycystic ovarian syndrome and pregnancy outcome.}, author={Iavazzo C and Vitoratos N}, journal={Arch Gynecol Obstet}, volume={282}, number={3}, pages={235-9}}
